title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I encountered a bug where I don't understand the behavior related to scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (specifically 'org.apache.ant'), I get the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Can you please explain what this message means?
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open the project 'org.apache.ant' in the workspace. 
2. Try to view the scoped type hierarchy of the project. 
3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'.
